title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When attempting to copy a package in the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module within 'jdt.ui3', the package name is not copied correctly. Selecting 'xxx' as the destination results in the copied package being named 'ui'.
OB: The 'xx' package contains a package named 'ui' after the copy operation.
EB: The copied package should be named 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module in 'jdt.ui3'. 2. Right-click on a package. 3. Select 'Copy Package'. 4. Choose 'xxx' as the destination. 5. Verify that the copied package is named 'ui' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
